main event: Possible satellite sighting reported near Midway Island
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 21/1400Z on June 8, 1963
The object was described as being the approximate size and shape of a first magnitude star, sighted 30 degrees above the horizon south of Midway
The object was observed moving in an easterly direction
The report indicates the sighting was evaluated as a satellite sighting due to the object's position relative to ECHO satellite
The report concludes the sighting was unidentified, possibly a satellite
sighted object: Bright object in the sky, approximate size and shape of a first magnitude star
